projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A selection of my most recent work, built with modern technologies and clean design.

archivio.name: Archivio (In progress)
archivio.description: AI bot using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) to process user-uploaded documents and respond to queries via WhatsApp. Frontend built with Vite, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database hosted on Railway.

alchimie.name: Alchimie
alchimie.description: Modern landing page for a perfume brand, developed as a fullstack application with Next.js (integrated frontend and backend) and Railway database. Features elegant design and optimized user experience.

beersech.name: Beersech
beersech.description: Corporate website for a digital agency built with Next.js, focusing on marketing and web development services with modern and responsive design.

rankmycv.name: RankMyCv
rankmycv.description: Artificial intelligence tool that analyzes your CV and compares it with job descriptions or LinkedIn links. Performs LinkedIn job scraping and provides detailed compatibility analysis and improvement recommendations.

ecochoice.name: EcoChoice
ecochoice.description: Complete WordPress optimization for a landscaping and green spaces design company. Significant improvements in SEO and loading speed according to Lighthouse metrics.

dakari.name: Dakari
dakari.description: Complete website migration from WordPress to Next.js, achieving substantial improvements in performance, loading speed, and overall user experience.

ffdiamond.name: FFDiamond
ffdiamond.description: FreeFire diamonds purchase platform built with Vite. Implementation of payment systems with MercadoPago and Stripe, bank transfer verification, and complete admin panel.

responsibilities: Frontend development in Angular.
Work with Node.js implementing BFF (Backend for Frontend) architecture to optimize communication between frontend and backend.
Use of Docker for application containerization and deployment.
Development and maintenance of internal Angular-based libraries, contributing to architecture and component reusability.
Development and maintenance of the Médico Online project, a telemedicine platform initiated before the pandemic.
Migration of JavaScript and jQuery code to React (18.3.1) with Redux and Tokbox.
Participation in development with .NET and C# for backend logic.
Use of Angular v13 and database management with SQL (2022).
Development in Spartacus, an Angular-based framework for SAP Commerce.
Implementation of new features and component optimization in Spartacus to improve user experience.
Participation in Deprati (Vue.js) and Promesa (Spartacus) projects, collaborating in the design and implementation of interactive and dynamic interfaces.
Application of SCRUM methodology with Jira and use of Bitbucket for code management and versioning.
Development and integration of modules in Angular v11 for a banking payments platform.
Work in Software Factory with project rotation.
Implementation of SCRUM methodology for better daily work tracking.
Repository management through TFS 2018 and Git for branch management.
Freelance work using SCRUM methodology with ticket management.
Development in marketing project for companies with Micro-Services architecture and GraphQL.
Work with Angular (V9) in collaboration with the frontend lead.
Repository management through GitLab and documentation with Notion.
First professional experience with training in Angular (V8).
Learning of programming fundamentals, Git, and SCRUM methodologies.
Development of teamwork and collaboration skills.
Contribution to interface creation using Figma.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Tools and technologies I use to develop modern and scalable products.

typescript.title: TypeScript & JavaScript
typescript.description: I work with both languages depending on the project, prioritizing best practices and static typing with TypeScript.

uiux.title: UI/UX & Design
uiux.description: I design functional and modern interfaces in Figma and implement them with Tailwind, Shadcn or Angular Material.

devops.title: DevOps & Deploy
devops.description: I use Vercel, VPS with Nginx and Docker for deployment. I have experience in configuration and maintenance of production environments.

tools.title: Tools & Workflow
tools.description: Git, GitHub, VSCode extensions, terminal and other key tools for agile and professional development.

architecture.title: Logic & Architecture
architecture.description: Design of scalable code structures, design patterns and software architectures that facilitate maintenance and growth of applications.

automation.title: APIs & Automation
automation.description: REST API integration, process automation and script development to optimize workflows and connect systems.

react.title: React
react.description: Development of interactive interfaces and reusable components with React, using hooks, context API and development best practices.

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: Fullstack application development with Next.js, leveraging SSR, SSG and API routes to create optimized web experiences.

angular.title: Angular
angular.description: Experience in development with Angular, including components, services, routing and state management with RxJS.

nodejs.title: Node.js
nodejs.description: Backend server and API development with Node.js, Express and other JavaScript ecosystem technologies.

python.title: Python
python.description: Development of scripts, automations and tools with Python, including data processing and APIs.

database.title: Databases
database.description: Work with PostgreSQL, MongoDB and other relational and NoSQL databases to efficiently store and manage data.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Application containerization with Docker, image creation and container orchestration for consistent deployments.

git.title: Git & Version Control
git.description: Code management with Git, GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. Experience in collaborative workflows, branching strategies and CI/CD.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities, collaborations, or just a chat.
